column2: "Luda Sorcerer is a Darker that can fight at any range, and can even teleport from place to place."
"Thanks to that teleporting ability, even if I get it into a good position, all my progress just gets undone."

"If I can't calm my nerves and focus on fighting it, I'll never be able to even think about Just Attacks...
I'm just not good enough."
"But it's a Darker. Our enemy. I can't sit around feeling sorry for myself."

"How would you do it, senpai...?
I need you to show me how you fight them with Just Attacks."
